# TrmSCII - Terminal-based School Management System 
## ğŸ“Œ Overview

TRMSCII (Terminal-based School Management System) is a simple yet powerful command-line application for managing school operations efficiently. It helps users handle student and teacher records, manage timetables, and store data securely using file handling.

## ğŸš€ Features

- **Student & Teacher Management** â€“ Add, update, and retrieve student and teacher details.
- **Timetable Management** â€“ Organize and display class schedules with proper formatting.
- **Data Persistence** â€“ Uses file handling to store records securely.
- **Fast Search & Retrieval** â€“ Implements HashMap and ArrayList for efficient data handling.
- **Terminal-based UI** â€“ Simple and lightweight interface without dependencies on external GUI frameworks.
- **Error Handling** â€“ Ensures smooth execution with proper exception handling.

## ğŸ›  Technologies Used
- Java  
- Java Collections Framework  
- File Handling

- Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)

- ArrayList

- Data Persistence  
- Timetable Management  

## ğŸ“‚ Installation & Usage
1. **Clone the Repository:**
   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/Jyotibrat/Simple-School-App.git
   cd Simple-School-App
   ```
2. **Compile the Java File:**
   ```sh
   javac SchoolManagementSystem.java
   ```
3. **Run the Application:**
   ```sh
   java SchoolManagementSystem
   ```
